column4: hey, i have ubuntu running from a live CD and i want to connect to the internet, but it seems that the speedtouch connection icon(.lnk) doesn't open with ubuntu, so i want to download WINE and try openning the speedtouch from there
you need to configure network settings then you dont need a speedtouch.lnk
I am running ubuntu from a live CD and I haven't fully installed it. I want to connect to the internet but it seems I can't
